Spy4Caster#

class spy4cast.spy4caster.Spy4Caster(yargs: Union[spy4cast.stypes.RDArgs, spy4cast.stypes.RDArgsDict], zargs: Union[spy4cast.stypes.RDArgs, spy4cast.stypes.RDArgsDict], plot_dir: str = '', mats_plot_name: str = 'mats_plot.png', mca_plot_name: str = 'mca_plot.png', cross_plot_name: str = 'cross_plot.png', zhat_plot_name: str = 'zhat_plot.png', plot_data_dir: str = '', plot_data_sufix: str = '')#

open_datasets() → spy4cast.spy4caster.Spy4Caster#
plot_crossvalidation(flags: int = 0, fig: Optional[matplotlib.figure.Figure] = None, cmap: Optional[str] = None) → spy4cast.spy4caster.Spy4Caster#
Plots:

  • r_z_zhat_s and p_z_zhat_s: Cartopy map of r and then hatches when p is <= alpha

  • r_z_zhat_t and p_z_zhat_t: Bar plot of r and then points when p is <= alpha

  • scf: Draw scf for all times for mode i. For the time being all in one plot

  • US

plot_mca(flags: int = 0, fig: Optional[matplotlib.figure.Figure] = None, cmap: Optional[str] = None) → spy4cast.spy4caster.Spy4Caster#
plot_preprocessed(flags: int = 0, fig: Optional[matplotlib.figure.Figure] = None, selected_year: Optional[int] = None, cmap: Optional[str] = None) → None#
plot_zhat(flags: int = 0, fig: Optional[matplotlib.figure.Figure] = None, sy: Optional[int] = None, cmap: Optional[str] = None) → spy4cast.spy4caster.Spy4Caster#
Paramaters:

  • sy: Predicted year to show

Plot:

  • zhat: Use sy to plot zhat on that year

  • z: Use sy to plot z on that year

preprocess(flags: int = 0, order: Optional[int] = None, period: Optional[float] = None) → spy4cast.spy4caster.Spy4Caster#

slice_datasets(yslise: spy4cast.stypes.Slise, zslise: spy4cast.stypes.Slise, yskip: int = 0, zskip: int = 0) → spy4cast.spy4caster.Spy4Caster#
